name: Fly Military Helicopter 18
description:
is a new unique modern challenging simulator game, unlike police plane transporter games, police car transporter games, police transport games, with army cargo plane, army cargo helicopter for army rescue missions, a part from transporting army criminals this game brings you the variety of army cargo supply responsibilities for army transport ship game. Get ready to be one-man army to complete the versatile jobs in this military cargo transport.
Features:
• Helicopter drive game to operate helicopter simulator
• Map to locate the position of soldiers and drop points
• Real Helicopter Controls
• Battlefield Environment
